outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
dataDirectory.comment: The base path for the directory to store a local cookie
mineraddress.comment: The ip or host address for your miner on your local lan, accessible from the host running the minerstatus script
minerusername.comment: The username for the miner on your local lan. Default root
minerpassword.comment: The password for the miner on your local lan. Default is empty string
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorHashboardLine.comment: The color to draw the line dividing header and rows for hashboards expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorWarn.comment: The color to show the temperature exceeding the tempWarning threshold expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
tempWarning.comment: The temperature at which values above it will be reported in warning state
